summary: The diff implements the proposals list and detail dialog with loading/empty/error states, adds approve/reject controls with success/error feedback, and adds backend + frontend mutation/query support for updating proposal status with pending-only validation and React Query invalidation. One additional, unrelated query hook (isParent) appears in the same hooks file.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained a parent-child installation relationship query hook and related backend query (isParent/isParent hook), which is not requested by REQ-20/21/22 (proposal list/detail + approve/reject flow).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is specifically about Steps 8â€“9 for proposals UI + moderation status updates; parent-child relationship checks are outside that scope.
